sentences.en: A ferocious battle to select a new parliamentary candidate is in progress.
sentences.cn: 推选一位新的议会候选人的激战正酣。

sentences.en: An active and expansive market economy is a necessary condition for progress.
sentences.cn: 积极扩张的市场经济是发展的必要条件。

sentences.en: artistic works that are in progress.
sentences.cn: 进行中的艺术品

sentences.en: He had retained a keen interest in the progress of the work.
sentences.cn: 他对那项工作的进展一直很关心。

sentences.en: His progress at school had been unspectacular compared to his brother.
sentences.cn: 和弟弟相比，他在学校里的进步很不起眼。

sentences.en: His remedial teacher sees signs of progress in his reading and writing.
sentences.cn: 他的辅导教师发现了他在阅读和写作方面进步的迹象。

sentences.en: I asked the nurse how my son was progressing.
sentences.cn: 我询问护士我儿子身体恢复得如何。

sentences.en: I was a bit depressed by our apparent lack of progress.
sentences.cn: 我对我们看似缓慢的进展感到有些沮丧。

sentences.en: It was a time of political stability and progress.
sentences.cn: 这是一段政治稳定和进步的时期。

sentences.en: Middle East peace talks in Washington showed signs of progress yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天在华盛顿举行的中东和谈有了取得进展的迹象。

sentences.en: Parents will be able to discuss their child's progress with their teacher.
sentences.cn: 家长将可以和老师交流谈论子女的进步情况。

sentences.en: The big clubs are becoming increasingly impatient at the rate of progress.
sentences.cn: 大牌俱乐部对缓慢的进展越来越不耐烦了。

sentences.en: The formalization of co-operation between the republics would produce progress.
sentences.cn: 正式确立合作关系将会促进共和国之间合作的顺利进展。

sentences.en: The police are disappointed by the slow pro-gress of the investigation.
sentences.cn: 警方对调查进度缓慢感到失望。

sentences.en: The two sides made little if any progress towards agreement.
sentences.cn: 双方在达成协议方面的进展甚微。

sentences.en: Their progress at work was mirrored by their children's educational advance.
sentences.cn: 子女在学业上有所进步，他们在工作上也就会有所起色。

sentences.en: There has been significant progress in controlling heart disease.
sentences.cn: 在控制心脏病方面取得了很大的进展。

sentences.en: We made good progress despite the snow.
sentences.cn: 尽管下雪，我们的行程还是很顺利。

sentences.en: We've made progress in righting the wrongs of the past.
sentences.cn: 我们在纠正过去的错误方面取得了进展。

sentences.en: You'll need such information to use as a baseline for measuring progress.
sentences.cn: 你会需要这些信息作为衡量进展的基准。

phrases.tran_cn: 进行：正在进行；在运行中
在…方面取得进步，取得进展
在……方面取得进步；在……方面取得进展
在制品；过程进行中的工作

trans.tran_en: the process of getting better at doing something, or getting closer to finishing or achieving something
the process of getting better at doing something, or getting closer to finishing or achieving something
to improve, develop, or achieve things so that you are then at a more advanced stage
the process of getting better at doing something, or getting closer to finishing or achieving something

trans.tran_cn: 前进， 行进； 进步， 提高
trans.tran_en: to improve, develop, or achieve things so that you are then at a more advanced stage
